channel.title: CVE Feed for Panasonic Corporation -- BN-SDWBP3
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Panasonic Corporation -- BN-SDWBP3

item.title: CVE-2018-0677|2024-08-05T03:35:48.979Z -- panasonic%20corporation -- bn-sdwbp3
item.description: BN-SDWBP3 firmware version 1.0.9 and earlier allows attacker with administrator rights on the same network segment to execute arbitrary OS commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0676|2024-08-05T03:35:48.852Z -- panasonic%20corporation -- bn-sdwbp3
item.description: BN-SDWBP3 firmware version 1.0.9 and earlier allows an attacker on the same network segment to bypass authentication to access to the management screen and execute an arbitrary command via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-0678|2024-08-05T03:35:49.276Z -- panasonic%20corporation -- bn-sdwbp3
item.description: Buffer overflow in BN-SDWBP3 firmware version 1.0.9 and earlier allows an attacker on the same network segment to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.
